attributes.action: Call on the government to apply to become an associate member to Erasmus+
attributes.additional_details:
We want UK students to have the same opportunities as students in the following states:

Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Republic of Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Norway, Iceland, Liechtenstein, North Macedonia, Republic of Türkiye and Republic of Serbia.
attributes.background: We want the Government to apply to become an associate member to Erasmus+. The Erasmus+ Programme focuses on higher education student mobility and includes opportunities to study, train or volunteer abroad for vocational students, apprentices, teachers, youth workers and volunteers.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/632688
